Generated Narrative: SearchParameter condition-subject-given

ConditionSubjectGivenSearchParameter

Parameter subject.given:string

Searches for condition based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.given={givenName}

ResourceCondition
Expression(none)
Target ResourcesCondition
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: ConditionSubjectGivenSearchParameter
description: Searches for condition based on the patient's given name(s) eg) /ws/fhir2/{release}/Condition?subject:Patient.given={givenName}
